Notes: A robotic NPC who quests the player to show him a specific enemy. This requires an instance of BringEnemy that can be linked to this object using GeneratorId. See BringEnemy to see what enemies are supported and how it's set up. After showing him the requested enemy, he will spawn a Power Star.

Obj_arg0.Name: Power Star Type
Obj_arg0.Description: Enables it to spawn a Power Star if set to 0.

Obj_arg3.Name: Color Frame
Obj_arg3.Description: The color frame to be used. Default is 0.

Obj_arg4.Name: Talk Animation
Obj_arg4.Description: The talk animation to use. Default is 0.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_A.Description: Activated or deactivated depending on the used event flow node.

SW_B.Description: Activated or deactivated depending on the used event flow node.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement when this switch is activated.

Rail.Description: The optional path that it can move on.

Camera.Description: Uses multiple cameras for different actions. 敵集め開始 is used when he requests the player to show him the enemy, 敵集め終了 is used when he holds the enemy above his head, 敵集めスター登場 is used before he spawns the Power Star. The game also registers a camera action under the name スター登場 but this is never used.

MarioFaceShipNpcRegister.Description: This object can be registered to a Starship Mario NPC appearance event.

AppearPowerStar.Description: Spawned after showing the requested enemy.

Message.Description: The text message ID to be used. Needs to be specified in the zone's text file.

EventFunc.Description: Object-specific behavior for EventFunc event flow nodes.

Values.Notes: Give 1-Up (only if not registered Power Star)

BranchFunc.Description: Object-specific behavior for BranchFunc branch flow nodes.

YoshiLockOnTarget.Description: This object can be targeted by Yoshi.
